name: Air Fryer Shrimp Tempura
author: Soup Loving Nicole
summary: Air-fried shrimp tempura for a more wholesome alternative. This is also good served with sweet chili sauce.
ingredients: 1 pound large shrimp - peeled, deveined, and tails left on
directions: Whisk soy sauce, sherry, rice wine vinegar, oyster sauce, scallions, sugar, lemon juice, and ginger stir-in paste together in a small bowl
Whisk egg, cornstarch, flour, and club soda together in a large bowl
Add shrimp and gently stir until shrimp are coated
Preheat an air fryer to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C) according to manufacturer's instructions
Cut a piece of parchment to fit the basket of the air fryer and set aside
Lift shrimp by the tail from the batter using tongs and let excess batter run off
Place as many shrimp as you can on the reserved parchment paper without overcrowding and place into the basket of the air fryer
You will need to cook the shrimp in batches
Cook in the preheated air fryer until desired crispness, about 8 minutes
